Question.Subject: About sign in to the waves I signed up for at lockerz Member Appreciation Redemption?
Question.Content:
Hi, I'm a Little confused
When they say that I need to sign in to each wave I signed up to what does that mean?
Does it mean that I just need to log in to lockerz at the time of the redemption and then log in to PTZ place?
Or is it something else?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
I think lockerz don't work well, the all video is fake!
It will be better use this service: sonsoldi.it
The only services certainly working are on "sonsoldi".

Answer.Content:
I think lockerz don't work well, the all video is fake!
It will be better use this service: sonsoldi.it
